hackathon-judges.judge-role: Developer Relations Manager FLIRONE, Lepton Business Development Manger - Handsets, FLIR
Vice President of Micro Camera Products, FLIR
Maker at Hacker Dojo; Founder OpenFuelCell, BioFabs

hackathon-eligibility: Strongly suggesting since this is an iOS App based decision, that a iOS developer is entered in the team, although not strictly required.
hackathon-requirements: Please submit here on challengepost.com your screen shots, presentation, and a description of your market fit, and technical innovation.
hackathon-rules: All apps will be judged on four criteria:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $2500 + FLIR ONE personal thermal imagers for the entire team +  FLIR wireless security cameras for the entire team
$1500 + FLIR ONE personal thermal imagers for the entire team
$750 + FLIR ONE personal thermal imagers for the entire team
$250 + FLIR ONE personal thermal imagers for the entire team

hackathon-location-address: 599 Fairchild Drive, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
hackathon-description-header: World's first FLIR ONE thermal sensor hacker / developer party!  First 50 developers get in for free (all others $25).
